data.text: Kuya Mafarisayo ne iwalangulitsi wa Ghamalaghitso iwalawile Yerusalemu wamghendela Yesu, wamghutsa,
“Ebali iwanang'ina wako ng'awokinda bae ipfihendo pfe iwabala wetu? Hawakuja ng'awohopfugha bae pfinoghile ghamoko ghawo!”
Yesu kawedika, “Ebali mwemwe ng'amkinda bae malaghitso ghe Imulungu ila mwopfiwinza ipfihendo pfenu?
Kwaapfila Imulungu kalonga, ‘Umtegheletse aba wako na mai wako,’ na ‘Imunu wowose iyomligha aba wake au mai wake ayo yakomighwe.’
Lekeni mwemwe mwolonga, ka imunu kana ichinu chochose ichidaha kumwapfila aba wake au mai wake, lekeni kolonga, ‘Ichinu chino nimlapfila Imulungu,’
imunu ayo ng'obamighwa bae kumtegheletsa aba wake. Apfo pfipfo pfamuibetsa imbuli ye Imulungu kwa kuwinza ipfihendo pfenu.
Mwemwe mwa wang'enye! Nabii Isaya tsakatabili ghoya, hayalongile,
‘Iwanu wano wonipfuka kwa kulonga,
Wonitamanila hela,
Yesu kaghukema ghumtingano ghwe iwanu, kawalongela, “Mtegheletse mpfimanye!
Achila ichikwingila mumlomo mwe imunu ng'achidaha bae kumtenda ‘yehe.’ Lekeni achila ichilawa kunze mwe mlomo we imunu, acho chomtenda ‘yehe.’ ”
Kuya iwanang'ina wake wamghendela wamghutsa, “Apfi komanya ka Mafarisayo hawahulike imbuli ino tsawona maya?”
Kawedika, “Chila mbiki ing'aghuhandighwe ne Aba wangu iyali kulanga ghutsong'olighwa.
Muwaleke awo, iwalongotsa pfifita. Ichifita ang'amlongotsa ichifita miyaghe, ambe wose weli watsakughwila mpondo.”
Petiri kamlongela, “Utulongele mana ye ghumfano ghuno.”
Yesu kawaghutsa, “Apfi namwe mwose mng'ali ng'ammanyile bae?
Angu ng'ammanyile bae ka ichinu chochose ichikwingila mumlomo mwe imunu chobitila munda, kuya choghenda kucholo?
Lekeni aghala igholawa mumlomo, gholawa mghati mwe ghumoyo, agho ghagho ighomtenda imunu yehe.
Kwaapfila mne ghumoyo gholawa ghamawatso ghehile na ukukoma na ughoni, ughutsu, ukulonga ung'enye na ubapfi na maligho.
Aghano ghomtenda imunu yehe, lekeni ukuja na ghamoko ghang'ahopfughighwe pfinoghile ng'akumtenda bae imunu yehe.”
Yesu koka hanu hala, kaghenda mne isi ya Tiro na Sidoni.
Ipinga yumwe Mkananayo tsayang'ali yokala habehi na isi atso kamghendela Yesu aku kokemelela, “Imtwatsa, Imwana wa Daudi, umbonele libatsi! Mwanangu kana chinyamkela, koghaya ng'ani.”
Yesu ng'edike chochose bae. Iwanang'ina wake wamghendela, wamlomba, “Mlongele yoke kwaapfila kotuwinza na kokemelela kuchughu kwetu.”
Yesu kedika, “Tsanitumighwa kwe iwanu wa Isiraeli waliheka iwaghile ka iwang'olo.”
Ipinga ayo kamghendela kamtowela ghamaghoti, kalonga, “Imtwatsa, unyapfile!”
Yesu kedika, “Ng'apfinoghile bae kusola ichijo che iwana na kuwasila wambwa.”
Ipinga ayo kalonga, “Ona, Imtwatsa, lekeni hata iwambwa wakuja ipfijo ipfilaghala mmetsa mwe iwatwatsa wawo.”
Kuya Yesu kamwidika, “Ghweghwe kwa mai yutoghola ghendo! Kutsotendelighwa chaubamile.” Bahala imwanaghe kahona.
Yesu tsakoka hanu hala, kaghenda mmbalimbali mwe tsimbu Galilaya. Kuya kagheluka kuchidando, kakala hasi.
ghumtingano mkulu ghwe iwanu ghumghendela na kumuhilikila ipfimbete na ipfifita na ipfibubu na iwanu iwaholole, ne iwanu wengi iwoghula, wamwikila hambele hake. Naye kawahonetsa.
Iwanu tsawakangawala hawonile ipfibubu wolonga, iwaholole wahona, ipfimbete woghenda na ipfifita wakona. Nawo wamtunitsa Imulungu wa Isiraeli.

Yesu kawakema iwanang'ina wake, kawalongela, “Nowonela libatsi iwanu wano, kwaapfila wakala na nene kwa ghamatsuwa madatu na wahela chokuja. Kuya sibama bae niwaleke woke ne inzala, kwaapfila watsotsilika mnzila.”
Iwanang'ina wake wamghutsa, “Akuno kunyika twodaha kupata kwani ichijo cha ukuwaghutitsa iwanu wose wano?”
Yesu kawaghutsa, “Mna pfighate pfingapi?”
Yesu kawalongela iwanu wakale hasi.
Kapfisola pfighate pfila saba na iwasomba, kapfibaliki, kapfibena kaweng'a iwanang'ina wake, nawo wawagholela iwanu.
Wose tsawaja na kwighuta. Kuya iwanang'ina wake wadondola ipfiseghe saba ipfimemile pfighate ipfisighale.
Iwamale iwajile tsawapetighwa, tsawakala elufu nne, iwapinga ne iwana ng'awapetighwe bae.
Kuya kawaleka iwanu woke, kadina mne mnumbwi, kaghenda mne isi ya Magadani.
